item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

But note that the colors are in (I believe) HSL format, instead of RGB. You can find a converter here to get the right values, but you still need to pack that into 8 bytes.

I’ll make a quick program that should get you close to the color you want.

Use this to convert, just take the output from the site, and plug it in.

public static int convert(final int degrees, final int saturation, final int lightness) {
    final float degreePercent = (float) degrees / 360;
    final float saturationPercent = (float) saturation / 100;
    final float lightnessPercent = (float) lightness / 100;
    return ((int) (degreePercent * 63) << 10) | ((int) (saturationPercent * 7) << 7) | (int) (lightnessPercent * 127);
}
